about_the_game:
You and your childhood friend Yua were supposed to just pick up a book from the decrepit building, but when a sudden twist of fate sends the two of you stumbling into a hidden realm teeming with spirits and yokai, it'll be up to you to find a way out! In this eerie supernatural dimension, you meet Izuna, who claims to be a great yokai with a fondness for humans. Can you escape this otherworldly realm, with the help of Izuna and the Kosaka sisters' spiritual powers?

Navigate through a labyrinthine, an uncanny version of the old campus building, evading malevolent spirits and dealing with curses. Form an alliance with the benevolent yokai Izuna to gain unique abilities. Your choices may lead you branching toward multiple endings with rewarding exploration and making the story highly replayable!

Classic Turn-based RPG Combat

Engaging turn-based RPG combat emphasizing elemental attacks. Be sure to pay attention to enemy strengths and weaknesses to maximize damage.

Engaging Storyline

Discover an intriguing narrative that unfolds as you make your way through the building’s haunted halls.

Multiple Endings

Experience five distinct story paths that are decided by your actions and choices made in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
